title._content: Emma Shank Memorial Service In Argentina

tag.raw: Emma Shank Memorial Funeral Argentina Mennonite Board of Missions Mennonite Mission Network Mission
tag.author: 52529054@N06

description._content:
Caption:  1969.  On the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the Pehuajo Mennonite Church, Albano Luayza, left, and Raul Garcia, right, gathered with others around the tomb stone of Emma Hershey Shank, the first Mennonite missionary to die in Argentina in 1939.

Citation: Mennonite Board of Missions. Photographs. Argentina, 1960's and 70's. IV-10-7.2 Box 1 folder 44, photo #4. Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana.
